channel.title: CVE Feed for Amssplus -- AMSS++
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Amssplus -- AMSS++

item.title: CVE-2024-2592|2024-08-28T15:39:21.612Z -- amssplus -- amss%2B%2B
item.description: Vulnerability in AMSS++ version 4.31 that allows SQL injection through /amssplus/modules/person/pic_show.php, in the 'person_id' parameter. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in the DB.

item.title: CVE-2024-2596|2024-08-21T17:44:38.201Z -- amssplus -- amss%2B%2B
item.description: Vulnerability in AMSS++ version 4.31, which does not sufficiently encode user-controlled input, resulting in a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability through /amssplus/modules/mail/main/select_send.php, in multiple parameters. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted URL to an authenticated user and steal their session cookie credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-2590|2024-08-12T20:45:12.288Z -- amssplus -- amss%2B%2B
item.description: Vulnerability in AMSS++ version 4.31 that allows SQL injection through /amssplus/modules/mail/main/select_send.php, in the 'sd_index' parameter. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in the DB.

item.title: CVE-2024-2599|2024-08-12T20:43:57.207Z -- amssplus -- amss%2B%2B
item.description: File upload restriction evasion vulnerability in AMSS++ version 4.31. This vulnerability could allow an authenticated user to potentially obtain RCE through webshell, compromising the entire infrastructure.

item.title: CVE-2024-2588|2024-08-12T20:44:46.265Z -- amssplus -- amss%2B%2B
item.description: Vulnerability in AMSS++ version 4.31 that allows SQL injection through /amssplus/admin/index.php, in the 'id' parameter. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in the DB.
